downloadTitle: Unified Communications Phones and Peripherals Datasheets
downloadDescription: These datasheets list the phones and peripheral devices that are qualified to display the "Optimized for Microsoft Lync" logo.

downloadFile.name: Lync IP Phones Comparison Table_Polycom KIRK DECT Wireless.pdf

downloadFile.name: Lync Comparison Meeting Room Devices Table.pdf

detailsSection:
The powerful communication devices that are listed in these datasheets are optimized to work with Microsoft Lync Server 2010 and Microsoft Lync 2010, delivering communications solutions that are easy to deploy, use and manage.

Each datasheet provides information about each device, including:
  • A thumbnail photo of the device
  • Hardware type
  • Name of the partner that produces the device
  • Product name
  • A brief description of the device
  • URL for the partner's Unified Communications landing page

systemRequirementsSection: View the datasheet using Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file you want by clicking the Download button next to the file name and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the file you downloaded on your hard disk to view the file.

To remove this download: Delete the file from your hard disk.
